speaker: President
english: President – The next item is the report ( A6-0358/2008 ) by Mrs Zdravkova, on behalf of the Committee on Petitions, on the annual report on the European Ombudsman's activities in 2007 ( 2008/2158(INI) ).
original: President – The next item is the report ( A6-0358/2008 ) by Mrs Zdravkova, on behalf of the Committee on Petitions, on the annual report on the European Ombudsman's activities in 2007 ( 2008/2158(INI) ).
agenda_item: Annual report on the European Ombudsman's activities in 2007 (debate)
